title: 87/6/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 December 1986 approving a second addendum to the programme relating to the marketing and processing of horticultural products in Ireland pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 10 December 1986
approving a second addentum to the programme relating to the marketing and processing of horticultural products in Ireland pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the English text is authentic)
(87/6/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The second addendum to the programme relating to the marketing and processing of horticultural products, forwarded by the Irish Government on 20 May 1986 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 is hereby approved subject to the reservation set out in the recitals above.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 December 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
